title: For Sale: 2 low grade T206s Lennox and Atz

posts.post_title: For Sale: 2 low grade T206s Lennox and Atz
posts.post_content:
Cards are pretty rough- asking 11 each or 20 for the pair shipped

Lennox is Sweet Cap, Atz is Piedmont

I can't get my pictures small enough to post here- so please PM if you are interested in front and back pictures of the cards

Thanks
Ed
